segments.text: I see the woman’s foot submerged in the puddle, and it makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water soaking through?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is so focused on drying that plate, completely oblivious to the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about all the potential dangers, and my heart races.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is a portrait of both bravery and foolishness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Watching him reach for the cookies is thrilling and terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a surge of anxiety every time the stool wobbles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s anticipation is palpable, her little hand reaching up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re so wrapped up in the thrill of it all, unaware of the serious consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only they could appreciate the moment without risking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR
